item.title: New Syncjacking attack hijacks devices using Chrome extensions
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new attack called 'Browser Syncjacking' demonstrates the possibility of using a seemingly benign Chrome extension to take over a victim's device through the browser. [...]

item.title: Microsoft lifts Windows 11 update block for PCs with gaming issues
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has removed a safeguard hold that prevented devices with Auto HDR enabled from installing the Windows 11 2024 Update due to gaming issues. [...]

item.title: Police seizes Cracked and Nulled hacking forum servers, arrests suspects
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Europol and German law enforcement confirmed the arrest of two suspects and the seizure of 17 servers in Operation Talent, which took down Cracked and Nulled, two of the largest hacking forums with over 10 million users. [...]

item.title: Time Bandit ChatGPT jailbreak bypasses safeguards on sensitive topics
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: A ChatGPT jailbreak flaw, dubbed "Time Bandit," allows you to bypass OpenAI's safety guidelines when asking for detailed instructions on sensitive topics, including the creation of weapons, information on nuclear topics, and malware creation. [...]

item.title: New Aquabotv3 botnet malware targets Mitel command injection flaw
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new variant of the Mirai-based botnet malware Aquabot has been observed actively exploiting CVE-2024-41710, a command injection vulnerability in Mitel SIP phones. [...]

item.title: Solana Pump.fun tool DogWifTool compromised to drain wallets
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: DogWifTools has disclosed on its official Discord channel that its software has been compromised by a supply chain attack that impacted its Windows client, infecting users with malware. [...]

item.title: Laravel admin package Voyager vulnerable to one-click RCE flaw
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Three vulnerabilities discovered in the open-source PHP package Voyager for managing Laravel applications could be used for remote code execution attacks. [...]

item.title: Microsoft investigates Microsoft 365 outage affecting users, admins
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is investigating an ongoing outage preventing users and admins from accessing some Microsoft 365 services and the admin center. [...]

item.title: FBI seizes Cracked.io, Nulled.to hacking forums in Operation Talent
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The FBI has seized the domains for the infamous Cracked.io and Nulled.to hacking forums, which are known for their focus on cybercrime, password theft, cracking, and credential stuffing attacks. [...]

item.title: Windows 11's Start menu is getting iPhone and Android integration
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: Windows 11's Start menu is getting a big update with full-fledged Android and iPhone integration, allowing users improved access to users' mobile texts and images from their computers. [...]

item.title: Uncover Hidden Browsing Threats: Get a Free Risk Assessment for GenAI, Identity, Web, and SaaS Risks
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by LayerX
item.description: As GenAI tools and SaaS platforms become a staple component in the employee toolkit, the risks associated with data exposure, identity vulnerabilities, and unmonitored browsing behavior have skyrocketed. Learn how a complimentary LayerX risk assessment can help identify, assess, and address browsing and SaaS risks in your workplace. [...]

item.title: Hackers exploit critical unpatched flaw in Zyxel CPE devices
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Hackers are exploiting a critical command injection vulnerability in Zyxel CPE Series devices that is currently tracked as CVE-2024-40891 and remains unpatched since last July. [...]

item.title: January Windows 10 preview update force installs new Outlook
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has started force-installing the new Outlook email client on Windows 10 systems for users who deploy this month's KB5050081 non-security preview update. [...]
